summary:
This Mod replaces the Decapitationgore textures.

There are many Versions with different resolutions: 512x512, 1024x1024, 2048x2048 and 4096x4096.

All of them available in an altered and darker color
descriptionHtml:
This Mod replaces the Decapitationgore textures.

I made a new texture, because the vanilla texture was seriously too small (128x128). I took some textures of Fallout 3. Don´t understand this wrong. I didn´t just copy and paste the textures. I made some effects and some colorcorrection effects, so it looks more darker.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

After V 1.0 some people commented the mod. I tried to satisfy there suggestions.
For example:

I made the texture darker, so it looks more realistic

I tried to make the gore more realistic. My 1.0 texture wasn´t very good. So i used another method to make an awsome texture.

The resolution of the textures were too high for some people. But I wanted to have a 4096x4096 texture, so i made different versions of it. You can now choose from 512x512, 1024x1024, 2048x2048, 4096x4096. The textures are all, if you prefer, available in a darker version.
See screenshots for more details

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

I made the texture with Gimp 2.6 (http://www.gimp.org/) and the .DDS Plugin (http://registry.gimp.org/node/70/)

Don´t be confused that my Username is "Starwarsfun2" and the description says "R4zerw4rs aka. Starwarsfun1". It´s "Starwarsfun2" because "Starwarsfun1" didn´t work. And R4zerw4rs because I don´t like the name "Starwarsfun1/2" ^^
Yeah... I got some "serious" troubles with my nickname :D
author: R4zerw4rs aka Starwarsfun1

files.name: V 1-1 normal texture replacer 128x128 to 4096x4096
files.changelogHtml:
I completly remade the texture.

I added more resolutions of the updated texture (512x512, 1024x1024, 2048x2048, 4096x4096)

I added a darker version of the texture (512x512, 1024x1024, 2048x2048, 4096x4096)
